attributes.action: Change the emphasis on the Highway Code by making it HIGHWAY LAW.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day people are killed on the UK roads. How many are caused by poor driving rather than the speed they are going at?
Killing the speed limits is not going to effect change. 
Creating a properly funded traffic police system, training people to drive rather than just past a test (ie a staged system that includes how to drive on motorways for example) and bringing all the traffic laws together  under one HIGHWAY LAW  is the only way to tackle this once and for all!
